Apartments

Iets Nuuts

Nestled between mountain and sea

Discover the tranquility of our guest house nestled in the picturesque coastal town of Hermanus, renowned for its breathtaking beaches, captivating whale-watching experiences and annual Kalfiefees (1 - 11 August 2024).

Ideally situated within a leisurely stroll, a mere 10-minute walk from the beach, our guest house offers a serene escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. With a backdrop of majestic mountains on the opposite side, you'll find a harmonious blend of coastal and mountainous landscapes here.

Enjoy our spacious apartments

Our self-catering accommodation offers two ground-floor units with one bedroom, one bathroom, a cozy living room, and a fully equipped kitchen. The top floor, available as a separate unit, features two bedrooms and a spacious kitchen, with a living room that opens to a captivating sea view.
